languages.text: "Атлас необходимо сохранить и использовать на благо Империума. Нельзя разбрасываться столь могущественными артефактами". {n}Алые глаза Кассии полны презрения, а голос непривычно груб.{/n} "Клан Сеттала, я... Тисифона и множество моих подданных уже заплатили своими жизнями за могущество, дарованное Дому Орселлио. Я докажу, что их жертвы не были напрасны".

traits.locale_text: "Атлас необходимо сохранить и использовать на благо Империума. Нельзя разбрасываться столь могущесвенными артефактами". {n}Алые глаза Кассии полны презрения, а голос непривычно груб.{/n} "Клан Сеттала, я... Тисифона и множество моих подданных уже заплатили своими жизнями за могущество, дарованное Дому Орселлио. Я докажу, что их жертвы не были напрасны".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. To squander such a formidable artefact would be outrageous idiocy." {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt, and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh.{/n} "The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."
languages.original_text: "Атлас необходимо сохранить и использовать на благо Империума. Нельзя разбрасываться столь могущественными артефактами". {n}Алые глаза Кассии полны презрения, а голос непривычно груб.{/n} "Клан Сеттала, я... Тисифона и множество моих подданных уже заплатили своими жизнями за могущество, дарованное Дому Орселлио. Я докажу, что их жертвы не были напрасны".

traits.locale_text: "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. To squander such a formidable artefact would be outrageous idiocy." {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt, and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh.{/n} "The Setthala clan. My subjects. Even myse— Tisiphone. Many have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. I shall prove that their sacrifices weren't in vain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「アトラスは保存し、帝国の利益のために使わなくてはなりません。こんなに恐ろしいアーティファクトを浪費するなど、言語道断の愚かさです」{n}カシアの赤い瞳は軽蔑に満ちており、その声は柄にもなく辛辣だ。{/n}「セッタラ家、あたくし自身…ティシフォン、そして多くの家臣たちはすでにオーセリオ家の力のために己の生涯を費やしています。あたくしには、その犠牲が無駄ではなかったと証明する義務があります」
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. To squander such a formidable artefact would be outrageous idiocy." {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt, and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh.{/n} "The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: 「アトラスは保存し、帝国の利益のために使わなくてはなりません。こんなに恐ろしいアーティファクトを浪費するなど、言語道断の愚かさです」{n}カシアの赤い瞳は軽蔑に満ちており、その声は柄にもなく辛辣だ。{/n}「セッタラ家、あたくし自身…ティシフォン、そして多くの家臣たちはすでにオーセリオ家の力のために己の生涯を費やしています。あたくしには、その犠牲が無駄ではなかったと証明する義務があります」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “为了帝国的利益，圣仪必须被保存下来，好好利用。这件造物拥有如此强大的力量，若是弃之不用，那简直是愚蠢至极。”{n}卡西娅的红眼睛里充满了蔑视的意味，声音也一反常态地严厉。{/n}“无论是塞塔拉氏族，我自己……提西福涅，还是我的无数臣民，都为奥赛罗家族的力量付出了生命的代价，我要保证他们的牺牲不会白费。”
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. To squander such a formidable artefact would be outrageous idiocy." {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt, and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh.{/n} "The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: “为了帝国的利益，圣仪必须被保存下来，好好利用。这件造物拥有如此强大的力量，若是弃之不用，那简直是愚蠢至极。”{n}卡西娅的红眼睛里充满了蔑视的意味，声音也一反常态地严厉。{/n}“无论是塞塔拉氏族，我自己……提西福涅，还是我的无数臣民，都为奥塞罗家族的力量付出了生命的代价，我要保证他们的牺牲不会白费。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « L'Atlas doit être préservé et ses capacités exploitées pour le bien de l'Imperium. Il faudrait être sacrément bête pour détruire un artefact d'une telle puissance, » {n}intervient Cassia sur un ton étonnamment sec, ses yeux rouges pleins de mépris.{/n} « Le clan Setthala, moi-même... Tisiphone et bien d'autres de mes sujets ont donné leur vie pour permettre à la maison Orsellio de s'élever. Il est de mon devoir de m'assurer que leur sacrifice n'aura pas été vain. »
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. To squander such a formidable artefact would be outrageous idiocy." {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt, and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh.{/n} "The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: « L'Atlas doit être préservé et ses capacités exploitées pour le bien de l'Imperium. Il faudrait être sacrément bête pour détruire un artefact d'une telle puissance, » {n}intervient Cassia sur un ton étonnamment sec, ses yeux rouges pleins de mépris.{/n} « Le clan Setthala, moi-même... Tisiphone et bien d'autres de mes sujets ont donné leur vie pour permettre à la maison Orsellio de s'élever. Il est de mon devoir de m'assurer que leur sacrifice n'aura pas été vain. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Debemos preservar el Atlas y utilizarlo por el bien del Imperium. Renunciar a un artefacto tan formidable sería una estupidez descomunal». {n}Los ojos rojos de Cassia están llenos de desprecio y su voz está revestida de una severidad inusitada.{/n} «El clan Setthala, yo misma... Tisiphone y muchos de mis súbditos ya han pagado con sus vidas por el poder de la casa Orsellio. Me corresponde demostrar que sus sacrificios no han sido en vano».
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. To squander such a formidable artefact would be outrageous idiocy." {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt, and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh.{/n} "The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: «Debemos preservar el Atlas y utilizarlo por el bien del Imperium. Renunciar a un artefacto tan formidable sería una estupidez descomunal». {n}Los ojos rojos de Cassia están llenos de desprecio y su voz está revestida de una severidad inusitada.{/n} «El clan Setthala, yo misma... Tisiphone y muchos de mis súbditos ya han pagado con sus vidas por el poder de la casa Orsellio. Me corresponde demostrar que sus sacrificios no han sido en vano».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Atlas muss für das Wohl des Imperiums bewahrt und genutzt werden. Ein solch formidables Artefakt zu vergeuden, wäre unerhörte Idiotie." {n}Cassias rote Augen sind voller Verachtung, ihre Stimme ist ungewöhnlich harsch.{/n} "Der Setthala-Clan, ich selbst ... Tisiphone und viele meiner Untertanen haben bereits mit dem Leben für Haus Orsellios Macht bezahlt. Ich werde beweisen, dass ihr Opfer nicht umsonst war."
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. To squander such a formidable artefact would be outrageous idiocy." {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt, and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh.{/n} "The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Der Atlas muss für das Wohl des Imperiums bewahrt und genutzt werden. Ein solch formidables Artefakt zu vergeuden, wäre unerhörte Idiotie." {n}Cassias rote Augen sind voller Verachtung, ihre Stimme ist ungewöhnlich harsch.{/n} "Der Setthala-Clan, ich selbst ... Tisiphone und viele meiner Untertanen haben bereits mit dem Leben für Haus Orsellios Macht bezahlt. Ich werde beweisen, dass ihr Opfer nicht umsonst war."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Atlas'ı muhafaza edip İmparatorluk'un çıkarları uğruna kullanmalıyız. Böylesine heybetli bir eserden faydalanmamak, çok büyük bir aptallık olur." {n}Cassia'nın kırmızı gözlerinden nefret akıyor, sesi ise alışılmadık bir biçimde sert.{/n} "Setthala klanı, kendim... Tisiphone ve kullarımdan pek çoğu; Orsellio Hanesi güç kazanabilsin diye canlarından oldu. Bu fedakârlıklarının boşuna olmadığını kanıtlayacağım."
languages.original_text: "The Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. To squander such a formidable artefact would be outrageous idiocy." {n}Cassia's red eyes are full of contempt, and her voice is uncharacteristically harsh.{/n} "The Setthala clan, myself... Tisiphone, and many subjects of mine have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. I will prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Atlas'ı muhafaza edip İmparatorluk'un çıkarları uğruna kullanmalıyız. Böylesine heybetli bir eseri israf etmek, çok büyük bir aptallık olur." {n}Cassia'nın kırmızı gözlerinden nefret akıyor. Sesi ise alışılmadık bir biçimde sert.{/n} "Setthala klanı, kendim... Tisiphone ve kullarımdan pek çoğu; Orsellio Hanesi'nin güç kazanması için canlarıyla bedel ödedi bile. Onların bu fedakârlıklarının boşuna olmadığını kanıtlayacağım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
